Quick search

Module: prepare¶

class apercal.modules.prepare.prepare(file_=None, **kwargs)[source]¶

Prepare class. Automatically copies the datasets into the directories and selects valid data (in case of multi-element observations)

copyobs()[source]¶

Prepares the directory structure and copies over the needed data from ALTA. Checks for data in the current working directories and copies only missing data.

go()[source]¶

Executes the complete prepare step with the parameters indicated in the config-file in the following order: copyobs

reset()[source]¶

Function to reset the current step and remove all generated data. Be careful! Deletes all data generated in this step!

split()[source]¶

Splits out a certain frequency range from the datasets for the quicklook pipeline

summary()[source]¶

Creates a general summary of the parameters in the parameter file generated during PREPARE. No detailed summary is available for PREPARE

returns (DataFrame): A python pandas dataframe object, which can be looked at with the style function in notebook
